import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel' import Moment from 'react-moment'; import axios from "axios"; import { LazyLoadImage } from 'react-lazy-load-image-component'; function Updates(props) { let publicPath = process.env.PUBLIC_URL; const [updatesLoading, setUpdatesLoading] = useState(false); const [updates, setUpdates] = useState([]); async function fetchUpdates() { setUpdatesLoading(true); try { const res = await axios.get(publicPath + "/assets/data/updates.json"); if (res.data) { setUpdatesLoading(false); setUpdates(res.data); } } catch (error) { console.error("error ", error); setUpdatesLoading(false); } } useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); fetchUpdates(); }, []); const carouselRef = useRef(null); const onPrevClick = () => { carouselRef.current.prev(); }; const onNextClick = () => { carouselRef.current.next(); }; return (
{/* */}

{updatesLoading ? 'please wait...' : ''} {updates && updates.map((row, index) => { return (
{row.title}

{row.small_description}

{row.started_at} - {row.ended_at} T&C

) })}
